Grant.Agency: National Institute for Health and Care Research

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: T.S. is Chair of the Health Research Authority and therefore recused himself from the Research Ethics Application. T.C. is a member of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence committee for long COVID. She has written self-help books on chronic fatigue and has done workshops on chronic fatigue and post-infectious syndromes. All remaining authors have no conflicts of interest.
